com.dtdsoftware.splunk.formatter
Interface Formatter

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultFormatter, TokenizedMBeanNameFormatter, TokenizedMBeanNameQuotesStrippedFormatter
public interface Formatter

 This interface can be implemented to provide custom formatting logic
 
 The custom implementation class can then be placed on the classpath and
 declared in the configuration xml file.

Author:
Damien Dallimore damien@dtdsoftware.com

format

java.lang.String format(java.lang.String Mbean,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> attributes,
                        long timestamp)
This method is called to format each Mbean attribute line

Parameters:
Mbean - the canonical mbean name
attributes - map of mbean attributes
timestamp - internal timestamp that can optionally be used in the output line
Returns:
the formatted payload
